methods.name: SimplifiedOperatorReducer
methods.logic: Constructor for the SimplifiedOperatorReducer class. Initializes the editor, JSGraph, JSHeapBroker, and branch semantics.

methods.name: reducer_name
methods.logic: Returns the name of the reducer, which is "SimplifiedOperatorReducer".

methods.name: Reduce
methods.logic: The main entry point for the reducer, responsible for reducing a given node in the graph.

methods.name: Change
methods.logic: Changes a node to a different operator with a single input.

methods.name: ReplaceBoolean
methods.logic: Replaces a node with a boolean constant value.

methods.name: ReplaceFloat64
methods.logic: Replaces a node with a float64 constant value.

methods.name: ReplaceInt32
methods.logic: Replaces a node with an int32 constant value.

methods.name: ReplaceUint32
methods.logic: Replaces a node with an uint32 constant value by converting it to int32_t.

methods.name: ReplaceNumber
methods.logic: Replaces a node with a number constant value (double).

methods.name: ReplaceNumber
methods.logic: Replaces a node with a number constant value (int32).

methods.name: factory
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the Factory object.

methods.name: graph
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the TFGraph object.

methods.name: machine
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the MachineOperatorBuilder object.

methods.name: simplified
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the SimplifiedOperatorBuilder object.

methods.name: jsgraph
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the JSGraph object.

methods.name: broker
methods.logic: Returns a pointer to the JSHeapBroker object.
